meanings: [명사] escape, flight, [동사] escape, flee, bolt, run[get] away (from), take (to) flight, make a getaway, (formal) fly, (연인과 함께) elope
(가격하다) hit, strike, knock, (informal) smack, (informal) wallop, (손바닥으로) slap, (주먹으로) punch, (informal) slug
(박수·손뼉 등을) clap, applaud, (크게) give a big hand

vlive.korean: 빨리 도망쳐나왔고요 그리고 뭐... So I ran away quickly and... 듣기 View video NCT : 오랜만이네💚
vlive.english: So I ran away quickly and...

vlive.korean: 야 너 또 이모랑 싸우고 우리집으로 도망쳐온 거냐? Did you escape to my house because you fought with your mom again? 듣기 View video 초등학생 관심거리연구소 (Super Cool Kids Lab) : [남자사람친구 14일전]_9화 | 너 나 몰래 바람핀거야?
vlive.english: Did you escape to my house because you fought with your mom again?

vlive.korean: 그러게 뭐하러 도망을 쳐, 쓸데없이 힘만 빼게! Why did you start to run away from the first place? You made us all tired. 듣기 View video 아이엠 (I am) : <사랑, 기억에 머물다> 2-2화 [ 주요인물 ]
vlive.english: Why did you start to run away from the first place? You made us all tired.

vlive.korean: 그러니까 무조건 도망치라는 것도 아닌데 상황 판단을 잘 해서... I don't mean to run away. You should calculate the risks. 듣기 View video NCT : 천지의 고민상담소
vlive.english: I don't mean to run away. You should calculate the risks.

vlive.korean: 야 넌 내가 지금 도망치는 것 같냐? Do you think I'm running away? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 모두가 날 안믿고 의심할 때.. [일진에게 찍혔을 때] EP12
vlive.english: Do you think I'm running away?

examples.korean: She didn't understand why her husband had to ran away from her at full split. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그녀의 남편이 왜 그렇게 빠른 속도로 도망쳐갔는지 이해할 수 없었다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She didn't understand why her husband had to ran away from her at full split. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If the soldiers are able to flee back to their bases the Korean police have almost no authority to arrest them there. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 만일 군인들이 부대로 도망쳐버리면 한국 경찰은 그들을 체포할 권리가 없다. EDU TIMES
examples.english: If the soldiers are able to flee back to their bases the Korean police have almost no authority to arrest them there. Add to Wordbook
